about_the_game:
Kid Katana Records teamed up with Dotemu, Tribute Games and Nickelodeon to release TMNT: Shredder’s Revenge OST, a perfect balance between classic TMNT and contemporary tunes, now on Steam!

Inspired by the music of one of the most iconic pop culture licenses of all time, main composition was assigned to Tee Lopes, the talent behind the music of Sonic Mania and Streets of Rage 4: Mr X’s Nightmare. His musical vision echoes the spirit of the turtles and this specific game specificities: tributes to classic TMNT tunes with a good dose of fun and switching fluidly between 80s/90s electro, funk, rock, and jazzy tunes with chiptune vibes.

On top of that, prestigious guests were added to the line-up. We’re proud to host legends such as Raekwon The Chef and Ghostface Killah from the legendary rap band Wu-Tang Clan, and Mike Patton, frontman of Faith No More and Mr Bungle. They all performed exclusive tracks recorded specifically for the game and the OST.

The Steam package includes all the tracks of the main game and its 'Dimension Shellshock' DLC, 43 tracks of pure TMNT tunes!
There is also a physical edition available on Kid Katana Records including a vinyl and an exclusive sticker board with all the game's playable characters!
Cowabunga!
detailed_description:
Kid Katana Records teamed up with Dotemu, Tribute Games and Nickelodeon to release TMNT: Shredder’s Revenge OST, a perfect balance between classic TMNT and contemporary tunes, now on Steam!

Inspired by the music of one of the most iconic pop culture licenses of all time, main composition was assigned to Tee Lopes, the talent behind the music of Sonic Mania and Streets of Rage 4: Mr X’s Nightmare. His musical vision echoes the spirit of the turtles and this specific game specificities: tributes to classic TMNT tunes with a good dose of fun and switching fluidly between 80s/90s electro, funk, rock, and jazzy tunes with chiptune vibes.

On top of that, prestigious guests were added to the line-up. We’re proud to host legends such as Raekwon The Chef and Ghostface Killah from the legendary rap band Wu-Tang Clan, and Mike Patton, frontman of Faith No More and Mr Bungle. They all performed exclusive tracks recorded specifically for the game and the OST.

The Steam package includes all the tracks of the main game and its 'Dimension Shellshock' DLC, 43 tracks of pure TMNT tunes!
There is also a physical edition available on Kid Katana Records including a vinyl and an exclusive sticker board with all the game's playable characters!
Cowabunga!

short_description: TMNT: Shredder’s Revenge OST includes all tracks from the vanilla game and Dimension Shellshock DLC (43 tracks). It was composed by Tee Lopes and features legendary guests: Mike Patton from Faith No More / Mr Bungle, and Raekwon & Ghostface Killah from Wu-Tang Clan, Cowabunga!
